PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-15772012-11-26,  ,  ,  ,  DFAIT
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Syria) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (SYRIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) contribute to concerted international efforts to further isolate and increase the pressure on the regime, and to erode its capacity for repression; and (2) signal Canada's support for the people of Syria.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0249 Publication Date: 2012-12-19
AttachmentsAttachment
